channel.title: vmware hyper v on akifmt
channel.description: Recent content in vmware hyper v on akifmt

item.title: VMware and Hyper-V Combine
item.description: To turn off Hyper-V; As administrator on cmd: bcdedit /set hypervisorlaunchtype off vmware available after reboot. To turn Hyper-V back on As administrator on cmd: bcdedit /set hypervisorlaunchtype auto Hyper-V is available upon reboot.
